description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 4 iterations of function f(x) = 2x + 3.
comments: Primes p such that (2p+3), (4p+9), (8p+21) and (16p+45) are also prime. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(300000) | IsPrime(p) and IsPrime(2*p+3) and IsPrime(4*p+9) and IsPrime(8*p+21) and IsPrime(16*p+45)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
